title: Repository Restructure for Unified mdxui
description: Restructure mdxui repo to serve as single source of truth for both documentation components and business-level type abstractions. Currently workers/mdxui has minimal documentation components (CodeBlock, Playground, Callout) while ui/packages/mdxui has comprehensive types (18,945 lines, 30 files). This epic consolidates both into a unified structure.
